text: Tanha Tasnia is a Bangladeshi film actress and model. She is best known for her 2018 film Bhalo Theko opposite Arifin Shuvoo in lead roles, which was directed by Zakir Hossain Raju. ==Career== Tanha Tasnia's first film Bhola To Jay Na Tare was released in 2016. Nirab Hossain was her co-star in the film. Her next film Dhumketu was released in 2016 too. Shakib Khan was her co-star in the film. Her third film Bhalo Theko was released in 2018. Arefin Shuvo was her co-star in the film. She has acted in TV dramas too. She has appeared in the TVCs of Bangas Biscuit, Suresh Khati Sorishar Tel, Pran Stick Biscuit, Elite Spot Cream, RFL Rack and Vasavi Fashion House.আরএফএলের বিজ্ঞাপনে তানহা তাসনিয়া She has appeared in the music videos of Ekti Golpo Chhilo and Tumi Name Keu Nei.‘এটা হবে সবার জন্য বড় চমক’ ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
